verses.text: The vision of Obadiah. This is what the Lord The LORD says about Edom. We have heard news from The LORD, and an ambassador is sent among the nations, saying, "Arise, and let’s rise up against her in battle.

text: The vision of Obadiah. This is what the Lord The LORD says about Edom. We have heard news from The LORD, and an ambassador is sent among the nations, saying, "Arise, and let’s rise up against her in battle.
